about.title: About {appName}
about.businessDesc: {appName} is a white-label web application for beverage brands and retailers. It allows each partner to present their own drinks, branding, and features in a customizable interface.
about.userDesc1: Users can browse drinks, search and filter by taste or ingredient, and discover new favorites. The app is fast, easy to use, and adapts to your chosen brand.
about.userDesc2: The experience is seamless on any device, with clear navigation and accessible design.
about.technicalDesc: {appName} is built for performance and flexibility:
about.codebase: The codebase is modular and easy to extend, with best practices for error handling and maintainability.
